publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-340# Tommy Sheridan: Police Guidelines in Relation to the Possession of Cannabisâ€”That the Parliament considers that the Association of Chief Police Officers in Scotland should issue the same guidelines in relation to the possession of cannabis as the Association of Chief Police Officers of England, Wales and Northern Ireland has done which will effectively decriminalise the drug for personal use.
S2M-340# Police Guidelines in Relation to the Possession of Cannabis (lodged on 12 September 2003) Rosie Kane*
S2M-340# Police Guidelines in Relation to the Possession of Cannabis (lodged on 12 September 2003) Chris Ballance*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Patrick Harvie*, Colin Fox*
S2M-340# Police Guidelines in Relation to the Possession of Cannabis (lodged on 12 September 2003) Mike Pringle*
S2M-340# Police Guidelines in Relation to the Possession of Cannabis (lodged on 12 September 2003) Mark Ballard*
